entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-05-17
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Cannot launch ios app on simulator or device "does not contain valid CFBundleVersion" #15144
  • [Windows] How to completely hide the TitleBar? #15142
  • CollectionView partially redraws items in collection #15141
  • [Bug] Picker Title Style Displaying Incorrectly #15139
    Backlog
  • IsClippedToBounds not working when content is translated or scaled. #15138
  • Windows does not show datalist dropdown #15136
    .NET 8 Planning
  • Windows emptyView text has different default placement #15131
    Backlog
  • Shell Flyout can't change background color and cancel rounded corner #15130
    Backlog
  • Filepicker doesn't work in sandbox mode (MacCatalyst) #15129
    Backlog
  • ContentPage gradient issue on iOS/MacCatalyst #15128
    Backlog
  • Button isenabled not working #15127
  • FilePicker on MacCatalyst app is not working (occasionally) #15126
  • How to destroy the webview or BlazorWebView on a page #15125
    Backlog
  • Resizetizer takes increasingly longer and longer to process image files when there are lots of images in a folder, such as svg files of flags of the world. #15124
    Backlog

Closed

  • Upgrading maui ios from 7.0.81 to 7.0.86 causes error build with dotnet ios 16.2 #15123
  • UI sometimes becomes uninteractive with the mouse after selecting a file from a file input (.NET MAUI Blazor) #15072
  • Avoid the need for custom MarkupExtension to load embedded images #8666
    Backlog
  • Close button - not close the app in window. #7197
    Backlog
  • ScrollView Orientation dynamic change not working in Android #7523
    Backlog
  • Changing Button Background and TextColor in Pressed and Released events not Updating Properly[Windows] #7543

PullRequests

Created

  • [Android] Don't dispose connectivity listeners #15145
  • Account for padding when expanding * rows/columns to new sizes #15143
  • Adjust index path for cell reuseid in carouselview #15140
  • Bump Microsoft.Net.Compilers.Toolset from 4.5.0 to 4.6.0 #15135
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Bump Microsoft.NET.Test.Sdk from 17.5.0 to 17.6.0 #15134
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Bump Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.CSharp from 4.5.0 to 4.6.0 #15133
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Bump Appium.WebDriver from 4.3.1 to 5.0.0-beta02 #15132
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Wrap Image with a grid on Windows so that it is centered with AspectFill #15122
    area/controls 🎮, community ✨, control-image

Merged

  • Add full list of MAUI versions to bug-report issue template #15120
    area/infrastructure 🏗️, community ✨

Updated

  • Update CODEOWNERS #15008
    area/infrastructure 🏗️, community ✨, partner/tizen
  • Android gallery fixes #15118
  • [Windows] fixing window glitches while moving or resizing #14861
    platform/windows 🪟, area/desktop 🖥️, community ✨
  • Update mappers instead of replacing field values #13836
    t/breaking 💥, needs-breaking-change-doc-created
  • [ios] fix memory leak in Image #15062
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/perf 🏎️
  • [workload] add metadata about .NET 6 EOL #15117
    area/setup 🪄
  • Add visual testing support, on top of Appium #14999
    area/testing
  • Ensure "text boxes" preserve cursor location #15099
    area/controls 🎮, control-entry
  • Android: fix dialog button colors in dark mode #15091
    platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, community ✨, control-dialogalert
  • Bump Xamarin.Android.Glide from 4.14.2.1 to 4.15.1 #15089
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Implement all permutations of InputTransparent and CascadeInputTransparent #14846
  • Fix contentview rtl #15114
    area/layout 🔲
